segment.target: This overview topic describes the process to follow when you are planning to deploy AppLocker rules.

segment.source: Description

segment.source: Understand AppLocker enforcement settings
segment.target: Understand AppLocker enforcement settings

segment.source: This topic describes the AppLocker enforcement settings for rule collections.
segment.target: This topic describes the AppLocker enforcement settings for rule collections.

segment.source: Understand AppLocker rules and enforcement setting inheritance in Group Policy
segment.target: Understand AppLocker rules and enforcement setting inheritance in Group Policy

segment.source: This topic for the IT professional describes how application control policies configured in AppLocker are applied through Group Policy.
segment.target: This topic for the IT professional describes how application control policies configured in AppLocker are applied through Group Policy.

segment.source: Document the Group Policy structure and AppLocker rule enforcement
segment.target: Document the Group Policy structure and AppLocker rule enforcement

segment.source: This planning topic describes what you need to investigate, determine, and record in your application control policies plan when you use AppLocker.
segment.target: This planning topic describes what you need to investigate, determine, and record in your application control policies plan when you use AppLocker.

segment.source: When you are determining how many Group Policy Objects (GPOs) to create when you apply an AppLocker policy in your organization, you should consider the following:
segment.target: When you are determining how many Group Policy Objects (GPOs) to create when you apply an AppLocker policy in your organization, you should consider the following:

segment.source: Whether you are creating new GPOs or using existing GPOs
segment.target: Whether you are creating new GPOs or using existing GPOs

segment.source: Whether you are implementing Software Restriction Policies (SRP) policies and AppLocker policies in the same GPO
segment.target: Whether you are implementing Software Restriction Policies (SRP) policies and AppLocker policies in the same GPO

segment.source: GPO naming conventions
segment.target: GPO naming conventions

segment.source: GPO size limits
segment.target: GPO size limits

segment.source: Note: There is no default limit on the number of AppLocker rules that you can create.
segment.target: Note: There is no default limit on the number of AppLocker rules that you can create.

segment.source: However, in Windows Server 2008 R2, GPOs have a 2 MB size limit for performance.
segment.target: However, in Windows Server 2008 R2, GPOs have a 2 MB size limit for performance.

segment.source: In subsequent versions, that limit is raised to 100 MB.
segment.target: In subsequent versions, that limit is raised to 100 MB.
